Description: The search interaction enables the client to query for Practitioner resources based on a specified set of demographics information. To activate a Practitioner resource search, you must include either the family or specialty parameter.

address.Name: address
address.Description: Search for Practitioner resources by any part of an address, such as street or city, where a practitioner can be found.

address_city.Name: address_city
address_city.Description: Search for Practitioner resources using the city portion of the address at which the practitioner can be found. This parameter must be used with the address_postalcode parameter.

address_postalcode.Name: address_postalcode
address_postalcode.Description: Search for Practitioner resources using the postal code portion of the address at which the practitioner can be found.

address_state.Name: address_state
address_state.Description: Search for Practitioner resources using the state portion of the address at which the practitioner can be found.

family.Name: family
family.Description:
Search for Practitioner resources by family (last) name. Family name searching supports both exact and "sounds like" matches.

Either Family or Specialty is required for a search to succeed.

gender.Name: gender
gender.Description: Search for Practitioner resources using the following gender codes: "female", "male", or "unknown".

given.Name: given
given.Description: Search for Practitioner resources by given (first) name. Given name searching supports both exact and "sounds like" matches.

specialty.Name: specialty
specialty.Description:
Search for Practitioner resources by specialty in the format [code system]|[code].

Either Family or Specialty is required for a search to succeed.

Bundle.Name: Bundle
Bundle.Description: Resource bundle. For more information, refer to the FHIR specification.

entry.Name: entry
entry.Description: A single entry returned as part of this bundle.

resource.Name: resource
resource.Description: A single resource returned as part of this bundle.

Practitioner.Name: Practitioner
Practitioner.Description: An instance of the DSTU2 Practitioner resource.

name.Name: name
name.Description: The name of the provider, including all prefixes and suffixes available.

practitionerRole.Name: practitionerRole
practitionerRole.Description: The practitioner's role at the organization.

role.Name: role
role.Description: Roles which this practitioner may perform.
